code: import React from'react';import{Link,Tooltip,IconButton,Zoom}from'@material-ui/core';import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Resume from'../../settings/resume.json';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{socialIcons:{position:'absolute',top:theme.spacing(6),right:theme.spacing(6)},iconButton:{height:'2.5rem',width:'2.5rem',display:'block',marginBottom:theme.spacing(2)},icon:{fontSize:'1.25rem'}};});export var SocialIcons=function SocialIcons(){var classes=useStyles();var socialItems=Resume.basics.profiles.map(function(socialItem){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{href:socialItem.url,key:socialItem.network.toLowerCase(),target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",underline:"none",color:"inherit"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Tooltip,{title:socialItem.username,placement:"left",TransitionComponent:Zoom},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(IconButton,{color:"inherit","aria-label":socialItem.network,className:classes.iconButton},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"".concat(classes.icon," ").concat(socialItem.x_icon)}))));});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classes.socialIcons},socialItems);};
